titles.title: A bill to amend the Foreign Trade Zones Act to permit the deferral of payment of duty on certain production equipment.

action.text: Sponsor introductory remarks on measure. (CR S803)
Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.

bill.summary: 1/27/1993--Introduced. Amends the Foreign Trade Zones Act to permit the deferral of payment of duty on merchandise admitted into a foreign trade zone for use as production equipment until such equipment is completely assembled, installed, tested, and used in the production for which it was admitted.
